metadata.description: Framework-aware code review skills and workflows for modern development

plugins.name: beagle-core
plugins.description: Shared code review workflows, verification protocol, git commands, and feedback handling

plugins.name: beagle-python
plugins.description: Python, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL, and pytest code review

plugins.name: beagle-go
plugins.description: Go, BubbleTea TUI, Wish SSH, and Prometheus code review

plugins.name: beagle-elixir
plugins.description: Elixir, Phoenix, LiveView, and ExUnit code review

plugins.name: beagle-ios
plugins.description: Swift, SwiftUI, SwiftData, and iOS framework code review

plugins.name: beagle-react
plugins.description: React, React Flow, React Router, shadcn/ui, Tailwind, Vitest, and Zustand code review

plugins.name: beagle-ai
plugins.description: Pydantic AI, LangGraph, DeepAgents, and Vercel AI SDK skills

plugins.name: beagle-docs
plugins.description: Documentation quality, generation, and improvement using Diataxis principles

plugins.name: beagle-analysis
plugins.description: Architecture analysis, 12-Factor compliance, ADR generation, and LLM-as-judge

plugins.name: beagle-testing
plugins.description: Language-agnostic test plan generation and execution
